mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( title, content, m_time ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{mTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT me.m_id, me.title, me.content, me.m_time, us.user_name, mid.`status` FROM USER AS us JOIN msg AS ms ON us.u_id = ms.f_id JOIN message AS me ON ms.m_id = me.m_id JOIN ( SELECT T.m_id, ( CASE
WHEN T.`count` = T.`sum` THEN '已读' WHEN T.`count` > T.`sum` AND T.`sum` = 0 THEN '未读' WHEN T.`count` > T.`sum` AND T.`sum` > 0 THEN '部分已读' END ) AS `status` FROM ( SELECT me.m_id, count( me.m_id ) AS `count`, sum( ms.`status` ) AS `sum` FROM USER AS us JOIN msg AS ms ON us.u_id = ms.f_id JOIN message AS me ON ms.m_id = me.m_id WHERE us.u_id = #{fId} GROUP BY me.m_id ) T ) mid ON me.m_id = mid.m_id WHERE us.u_id = #{fId} AND ( ms.del_status = 0 OR ms.del_status = 2 )
AND me.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND mid.`status` = '未读'
AND mid.`status` = '已读'
AND mid.`status` = '部分已读'
AND me.m_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
ORDER BY me.m_time DESC

SELECT temp.m_id, temp.title,temp.content,temp.m_time,temp.user_name,GROUP_CONCAT(user.user_name) as susername FROM (SELECT me.m_id,me.title,me.content,me.m_time,us.user_name,ms.s_id from `user` as us join msg as ms on us.u_id = ms.f_id join message me on ms.m_id = me.m_id where us.u_id = #{uId} and me.m_id = #{mId}) temp JOIN user on temp.s_id = user.u_id GROUP BY temp.title,temp.content,temp.m_time,temp.user_name

SELECT me.m_id,me.title,me.content,me.m_time,us.user_name,ms.status,ms.msg_id from `user` us join msg ms on us.u_id = ms.f_id join message me on ms.m_id = me.m_id where ms.s_id = #{sId} and me.m_id = #{mId}
